$interpreted: Pang: Hmph, being by oneself is the most relaxing after all. I've always been like this anyway,
Pang: ever since I was exiled...
Menacing Bandit: This tiger beast again!?
Pang: The group that was chasing after Puggi last time?

Barbaric Bandit: P, please have mercy, sir!
After the last incident, we've changed our ways and have stayed away from any bad deeds.
Barbaric Bandit: We also didn't seize your friend. Please let us go...
Pang: Friend? You mean the fat bird?

Barbaric Bandit: Yes. A few days ago, we were chasing after him for the Matsutake mushrooms he stole from us. 
As he was running, he mumbled something about

Barbaric Bandit: sharing the shrooms with his best buddy and refused to give them back to us... 
I assume that the "buddy" is referring to you?
Pang: He said that?

Menacing Bandit: Didn't you just call him fat bird?
Only really good friends can poke fun at each other like that...

Barbaric Bandit: If you think about it, that fat bird isn't all that bad. 
If you don't count the random stuff he spews, he's pretty nice to his pals...
Stewart: Hmph, so you're finally at a dead end? The Tiger Beast is no longer here anymore too. I wonder who's going to protect your *** now? Get him!
Puggi: HELPPPP! C, can't you reconsider the deal?
Pang: Hold it right there!
Puggi: Pang! You're finally here to save me!
Puggi: My buddy is here. You guys are now dead meat!
Pang: Who says I'm here to save you?
Puggi: You aren't!?
Stewart: Then why all the ruckus?
Pang: This is my meal box for tomorrow, so I'm here to get it back.
Pang: If you want to fight me for it, you'll have to do it the hard way!
Pang: I win, so this meal box is mine. Any questions?

Stewart: N, no sir...
Everybody run!

Puggi: Pang~ I knew you would come back for me! 
As your pal, my trust is answered after all~ *Sobs*~

Pang: Do not misunderstand. 
I just don't want another friend to die because of my incompetence.
Puggi: Hmm, why "another"?
Puggi: Wait, so the friend you mentioned before, he dead?

Puggi: Eheheheh~ are you feeling OK?
Did I accidentally bring up some sad memories?
Pang: Nothing.
Puggi: If so, judging by what you meant, does this mean you now consider me a friend?
Pang: Shut it!
Puggi: Ahh, I sure do miss these sharp jabs~ As a celebration of our reconciliation, tell me a joke or two.
Pang: No.
Puggi: Then how about just one joke.
Pang: No,
Puggi: Then three.
Pang: That's more than one, you dumb fluffball.
Puggi: Puhahaha, that's a good one. I like it!
Puggi: Pang, my instincts tell me that fun things await us if we go this way. Let's hurry...

Pang: If you sense fun, then it's guaranteed trouble.
Therefore, we go this way.
Puggi: Puggi puggi puggi...
